message.name: ERR_CASE_AUDIT_NO_CONFIGURATIONS_AVAILABLE
message.locale: No types have been configured. Please contact your administrator.

message.name: INF_CONFIRM_REMOVE_AUDITOR
message.locale: Are you sure you want to remove this %1s from the audit plan? Any Case Audits assigned to this %1s will return to the 'Open' status.

message.name: PAGE_DESC_AUDIT_PLAN
message.locale: Audit Plan

message.name: PAGE_DESC_CASE_AUDIT
message.locale: Case Audit

message.name: ERR_CASE_AUDIT_SELECT_CASE_BOTH_CLIENT_REF_NAME_ENTERED
message.locale: Values for client reference and client name should not be entered together.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_TYPE_NOT_SET
message.locale: A type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_COORD_NO_ACCESS
message.locale: Only an Audit Coordinator can change the Coordinator on an Audit Plan.

message.name: ERR_FV_CANNOT_MODIFY_AUDIT_PLAN_FOCUS_AREAS
message.locale: Focus areas can only be altered if the status of the audit plan is 'pending'.

message.name: ERR_NO_CASE_SELECT_CRITERIA_ENTERED
message.locale: A value for one of case reference, client reference or client name should be entered.

message.name: ERR_NO_CASE_AUDITS_SELECTED_FOR_ASSIGNMENT
message.locale: Please select one or more cases for assignment.

message.name: ERR_CASE_AUDIT_FV_AUDIT_TEAM_NO_MEMBERS
message.locale: An audit team must consist of at least one auditor.

message.name: ERR_CASE_AUDIT_FV_AUDIT_TEAM_NEW_OR_EXISTING_TEAM_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: Either a new or existing audit team must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CASE_AUDIT_FV_AUDIT_TEAM_BOTH_NEW_AND_EXISTING_TEAM_SELECTED
message.locale: Values for a new and existing audit team should not be entered together.

message.name: ERR_AUDIT_PLAN_XRV_CANNOT_MODIFY_AUDIT_PLAN_INVALID_USER
message.locale: This audit plan can only be modified by the audit coordinator.

message.name: ERR_RV_NO_CASE_AUDIT_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one case audit must be selected.

message.name: ERR_RV_NO_CASE_AUDIT_STATUS_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one audit status must be selected.

message.name: ERR_RV_NO_ASSIGNEE_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one assignee must be selected.

message.name: ERR_RV_NO_AUDITOR_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one auditor must be selected.

message.name: ERR_CASE_AUDIT_FV_AUDIT_TEAM_CANNOT_HAVE_THE_SAME_NAME
message.locale: An audit team cannot have the same name as an existing team
